p: CMV-NiV-F and CMV-NiV-G expression cassettes were synthetized by Eurofins genomics (Milano, Italy). The expression cassettes were excised with SmaI (Thermo Fisher Scientific), cloned into the shuttle vector pINT 2 [ 36], before cutting with the same enzyme to generate pTK-CMV-NiV-F-TK and pTK-CMV-NiV-G-TK targeting vectors.
